source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SEQ_00<tab>Ronitt appears to have something in his eye. You cannot be certain because of his helmet, but it may be a twinkle.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SEQ_00特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト受注クラス・ジョブ制限
ワッツハンマー・ガレージのロニットは、再び相談したいことがあるようだ。

source:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SEQ_01The next essential piece of the Rolling Tankard prototype is its cannon, though Ronitt is unsure how best to proceed. He comes to the conclusion that utilizing condensed aether should prove effective in combating sin eaters, although this is a field in which none of the dwarves present have any experience. Regitt recommends seeking the advice of Lorathia, who was once an engineer at the Crystarium.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SEQ_01※本クエストには
「 レベルアジャスト受注クラス・ジョブ制限」が、
　設定されています。
　受注時と同じクラスでのみ進行できます。

ロニットは、ドワーフ戦車に組み込む主砲について思案していたようだ。元技術者であるロラシアに相談するため、クリアメルトに向かい「ロニット」と話そう。

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SEQ_02<tab>Ronitt arrives in Clearmelt to ask Lorathia whether she has any knowledge of aether-based weaponry. Fate conspires once again to bless him with outrageous fortune when Lorathia reveals she is in fact the very person who designed the crystal cannons that line the Crystarium. However, rather than go into any further details regarding this, Lorathia instead invites you to a tea party with her two friends, Iriolva and Cobleva. These elderly twins own merchant caravans that deliver goods across Norvrandt, and they are looking for a way to fend off sin eaters. Lorathia points out that this is an opportunity for Ronitt to secure buyers for his tanks, although his lack of social decorum requires that you be on hand to guide him through this informal exchange.
target: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SEQ_02<tab>ロニットと話した。魔装砲の発明者であると判明したロラシアは、紹介状を書く代わりに友人とのお茶会に参加するよう要求してきた。クリアメルトにいる「ロラシア」と話そう。

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SEQ_03<tab>The tea party ends with both twins expressing a keen interest in Ronitt's creations, although they will need to see the final product in action before they commit to a purchase.
target: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SEQ_03<tab>お茶会に参加した。どうにか紹介状を入手することができそうだ。再びクリアメルトにいる「ロラシア」と話そう。

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SEQ_04<tab>Lorathia gives you a letter of introduction to speak with Rosard in the Crystarium. She is confident he can assist in designing the tank's cannon, though it is still unclear whether you will need to jump through any more proverbial hoops before he agrees to help.
target: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SEQ_04<tab>ロラシアから紹介状を受け取った。クリスタリウムのバリスティクス造兵館にいる「ロサード」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E905401 /var>」を渡そう。

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SEQ_05<tab>Rosard is eager to support you and Ronitt in your endeavors, and provides you with the blueprints to the Crystarium's crystal cannons. While your dwarven companion is taken aback by the unexpected show of generosity, Rosard explains that he is acting in accordance with Lorathia's wishes, as stated in her letter.
target: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SEQ_05<tab>バリスティクス造兵館のロサードから魔装砲の設計図を受け取った。ワッツハンマー・ガレージに戻り「ロニット」と話そう。

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SEQ_06<tab>Back at Watts's Anvil, Ronitt asks you to craft some of the cannon's components, as described in the blueprints. As before, his automaton somehow has the exact materials required stored in its metallic belly, though this miraculous ability to produce precisely what is needed at any given moment should come as no surprise by now.
target: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SEQ_06<tab>ロニットは、さっそく魔装砲をドワーフ戦車へ応用したいようだ。ロニットに協力するため、ワッツハンマー・ガレージにいる「資材調達オートマトン」と話し、必要な素材を入手しよう。

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SEQ_07<tab>With the necessary materials at your disposal, you are ready to fulfill Ronitt's order. But will your attempt to assist Ronitt end in triumph or bitter failure?
target: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SEQ_07<tab>資材調達オートマトンから素材を受け取った。主砲の製造に必要なものを準備し、ワッツハンマー・ガレージの「ロニット」に納品しよう。

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SEQ_08<tab>Mastery of your craft has ensured you seized victory rather than bitter defeat. As is customary, Ronitt downplays your achievement, though delight is clear on his face. Or would be, if one could see it. Although the prototype Rolling Tankard is ready for its first test run, Ronitt will still require your aid with other miscellaneous tasks in preparation for the next stage of his master plan: mass production.
target: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SEQ_08<tab>主砲の製造に必要なものをロニットに渡した。すべてのパーツが揃い、ドワーフ戦車の試作車両がついに完成した。引き続き、ドワーフ戦車の普及に向けてロニットたちに協力していこう。

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_000<tab>It's time to work on the most interestin' part of the Rollin' Tankard's design: the cannon!
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_000いいとこに来てくれたべな！
実はこれから、ドワーフ戦車の「主砲」をどうするか、
みんなに相談しようと思ってたとこなんだ！

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_001<tab>Me and the others have a few things to go over first, so come and join us in the usual place.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_001いつもの場所で話し合いするから、絶対来てくれよな！
オメーもワッツハンマー・ガレージの仲間だからよ！

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_002<tab>...But those bastard sin eaters won't even get the chance to test our defenses if we blow their heads off first! That's why we need a cannon. The bigger, the better. 'Course, there were no sin eaters back in Watts's time, but with a bit of Tholl ingenuity...
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_002と、いうわけで！
はぐれ罪喰いに対抗できる、「主砲」を作りたいんだべ！
ワッツの時代には罪喰いはいねーから、想定されてなかったんだ。

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_OZOGG_000_003<tab>Hold it right there! Aren't you afraid I'll steal your secrets? And why did you even invite me to this meeting in the first place?
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_OZOGG_000_003ちょっと待て待てー！
呼ばれて来てみたが、あたしがこの場にいてもいいのか？
だって、ほら……コグー一家なんだぜ……？

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_004<tab>Well, you want me to finish buildin' these tanks, don't you? Our reasons might be different, but we're workin' towards the same goal.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_004今さら、なに言ってんだべ？
一緒に同じものを作るなら、オメーももう仲間なんだべ。

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_REGITT_000_005<tab>Yeah! Besides, you've already built the brewery, the ethanol mill, and shared a bunch of <var 1A 02 /var>your<var 1A 01 /var> secrets with us. You're on board now whether you like it or not!
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_REGITT_000_005それに、コグー一家「秘伝」の燃料を提供してる時点で、
お前さんはもう、黙ってるしかないラリな。
諦めて協力するラリ。

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_OZOGG_100_006<tab>I didn't agree to become one of your lackeys! I come and go as I please!
target: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_OZOGG_100_006<tab>……それは盲点！

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_OZOGG_000_006<tab>And how do I know all this stuff about sin eaters isn't some elaborate ruse? You could be building these war machines to attack Komra!
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_OZOGG_000_006そもそも、ドワーフ戦車を作って何するつもりなんだ？
ハッ……まさかコメラの村を襲おうって魂胆じゃないだろうな！？

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_KARUTT_000_007<tab>Well, we weren't pl-planning to, but now that you mention it...
target: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_KARUTT_000_007<tab>ホントにそもそもだに～。

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_008<tab>Ozogg, that's a load of claptrap and you know it. If we wanted to invade Komra, it be as easy as snatchin' the helmet off a baby, and we wouldn't need no tanks, neither! We just wanna help people, that's all.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_008絶対にドワーフ戦車を争いには使わねーべ。
オレ様たちはワッツのアイディアを実現させて、
困ってる奴らを助けたいだけなんだべ！

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_009<tab>Ain't that right!?
target: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_009<tab>そうだべ？

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_OZOGG_000_010<tab>Hmph! That's all very noble, I'm sure, but I'm only here for one thing: Watts's hammer! If getting my hands on it means I have to help with your idiotic plan, so be it!
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_OZOGG_000_010ま、あたしもテメーらの邪魔をするつもりはない。
楽しそ……いやこれも「ワッツのハンマー」のためだしな。

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_011<tab>Idiotic? That's rich comin' from you! And maybe you should wait till I've finished explainin' about the cannon before you start judgin'!
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_011へへっ、そんじゃ！
仲間が揃ったところで、改めて話し合い再開だべ！

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_KARUTT_000_012<tab>Y-You mean to say sin eaters won't run away, even if they're injured? Watts's beard... What have we g-gotten ourselves into!?
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_KARUTT_000_012野生の獣なら、多少痛い目に遭わせれば逃げてくれるけど、
はぐれ罪喰いとなると、そうはいかないだに……。
どうすればいいだに？

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_OZOGG_000_014<tab>Why injure them when you can kill them outright? They won't be getting up again if you blast them to smithereens. A nice bit of gunpowder should do the trick, but I wouldn't trust you Tholls not to blow <var 1A 02 /var>yourselves<var 1A 01 /var> to bits in the process.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_OZOGG_000_014威力だけ考えれば、爆弾って手もあるが……
素人が扱えば、かえって危険だからな。

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_015<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, you've fought sin eaters, haven't you? Got any suggestions?
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_015)) (( )) 02 /var>、
オメーは罪喰いと戦ったことがあるべな！
どんな攻撃だったら、罪喰いを倒せると思うべ？

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_Q1_000_000<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_A1_000_001<tab>Bombarding them with magic from a distance usually gets the job done.
target: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_A1_000_001<tab>攻撃的な遠隔魔法が使えれば……

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_A1_000_002<tab>A beam of pure energy. It'll look pretty, too.
target: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_A1_000_002<tab>かっこいいビームを撃つ！

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_016<tab>Magic? Dunno about that, mate. I think hiring a qualified mage to go along for the ride might get expensive. But if there was a way to produce a similar effect using machinery, that would be worth explorin'.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_016なるほど、魔法か……だが習得するには素質も修業も必要だべな。
……いや、つまり機械的にそれが可能になればいいんだべ……
そうだ、何らかの方法で、エーテルを集束して放出できれば……！

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_017<tab>So, we can destroy sin eaters and look good while we do it? Well, it's got my vote!
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_017うおおおおっ、それは思いつかなかったんだべ！！
ズギューンって、かっこいいビームが撃てたら最高だべな！！
さっすが)) (( )) 02 /var>だべ～！

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_OZOGG_000_018<tab>Hmm... The only method I can think of would be to charge a crystal with aether and then release it all in one go. Though I hate to say it, but this is rather outside of my field of expertise.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_OZOGG_000_018なるほどな……例えばクリスタルから抽出したエーテルを集積して、
ビームのように一気に放出して照射するってとこか……。
面白そうだが、さすがに未知の技術だぜ。

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_REGITT_000_019<tab>Why don't you ask that Lorathia lady over at Clearmelt? She used to be an engineer.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_REGITT_000_019あの、温泉にいるおっかないばーさんは、
たしか元技術者って言ってたラリ。
何かアイディアをくれるかもしれないラリよ？

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_020<tab>It's worth a try, I guess.
target: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_020<tab>たしかに、話を聞いてみる価値はありそうだべな……。

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_021<tab>I'd feel a lot better if you came with me, for moral support, like. To tell the truth, I find her a bit intimidatin'... A-Anyway, let's get goin'!
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_021)) (( )) 02 /var>、
オメーも一緒に「クリアメルト」に来てくれたら嬉しいんだべ！

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_030<tab>Phew! Thank the gods you're here! I was afraid I'd have to talk to her by myself. Ah well, here goes nothin'...
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_030来てくれてありがとな！
さっそく相談してみるんだべ！

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_031<tab>Lali-ho, old crone!
target: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_031<tab>ラ、ラリホー！

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_LORATHIA_000_032<tab>Bloody hells. I see your manners haven't improved since the last time we met. <sigh> Whatever it is you came to say, spit it out. I've got guests arriving soon.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_LORATHIA_000_032ん、誰かと思えばこの間の坊主たち。
お茶会の準備で忙しいんだけどね……何か用かい？

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_LORATHIA_000_033<tab>You want to fit the tanks with aether cannons? So you do have more than sawdust in that head of yours.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_LORATHIA_000_033ほーう、エーテル照射機能をドワーフ戦車に組み込みたいって？
なかなか面白いことを考えるじゃないか。

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_034<tab>Seems like a backhanded compliment to me, but I'll take it all the same! Though I must admit, I'm not used to workin' with aether and whatnot. Don't s'pose you know anythin' about it?
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_034へへっ！
)) (( )) 02 /var>のアイディアなんだべ！
ねーちゃん、エーテルを照射する技術にアテはねーか？

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_LORATHIA_000_035<tab>As a matter of fact, I'm the one who designed the crystal cannons lining the walls of the Crystarium.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_LORATHIA_000_035やれやれ、誰に聞いてんだい？
クリスタリウム防衛の要である「魔装砲」を開発したのは、
何を隠そう……この私だよッ！

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_036<tab>Nah, you're pullin' my leg. I've had a lot of strange coincidences lately, but that's not even remotely feasible. Wait...you're serious, aren't you?
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_036うおお、オメーもすげー奴だったんだな！
なら、オレ様たちに教えに来てくれよ！

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_LORATHIA_000_037<tab>Of course I am! But if you want me to share my secrets, you'd better make it worth my while!
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_LORATHIA_000_037あまーーーーーーーーい！！！
タダで教えてもらおうなんて、根性が甘いッ！！
だいたい私に何のメリットがあるっていうんだい？

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_038<tab>Ah! I know where this is leadin'! You're gonna send us to the ends of the earth on some godsforsaken errand, just to test our resolve, aren't you?
target: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_038<tab>ど、どうしたら教えてくれるんだ……？

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_LORATHIA_000_039<tab>No, you bloody idiot, that's not what I mean at all! Listen, I have some friends coming over for tea and I want the pair of you to join us.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_LORATHIA_000_039うーん……面倒だねぇ、まったく。
じゃあ、あんたたち今からお茶会に参加していきな！
茶飲み友達の相手をしてくれたら、紹介状を書いてやってもいいよ。

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_040<tab>Tea? That's slightly less perilous than I was expectin'. But what does that have to do with anythin'?
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_040はぁ！？　お、お茶会！？
それ、全然関係ないべ……絶対思い付きだべな！？

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_LORATHIA_000_041<tab>If you shut your piehole, you might find out! My guests are twin sisters whose supply caravans run the length and breadth of Norvrandt. I reckon they'll have more than a passing interest in buying those tanks of yours.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_LORATHIA_000_041嫌なら諦めるんだね！
それに今から来る姉妹は、隊商のオーナーをやってるんだ。
うまくやれば、戦車を売り込むチャンスだと思うんだけどね。

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_042<tab>Buy? You mean to tell me we could make a <var 1A 02 /var>profit<var 1A 01 /var> on these tanks? I was plannin' to give 'em away for nothin', but I might as well take the opportunity to line my pockets.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_042はっ……そういうことか！
後々戦車を世に普及させるには、取引相手が必要だべな！
か、会話は苦手だが……やってみるべ……！

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_LORATHIA_000_043<tab>It's clear your friend's not much of a businessman, so you'd better do the talking.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_LORATHIA_000_043あんたもだよ。
うまくドワーフ戦車とやらをアピールしてみな。
「商談」だと思って、粗相がないようにやるんだよ！

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_LORATHIA_000_044<tab>I still have some things to prepare before my guests arrive, so give me a few moments, would you?
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_LORATHIA_000_044それじゃ、準備が整うまでちょっと待っとくれ。
しばらくしたら私に声をかけな。

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_100_044<tab>All I have to do is shut up and let you handle it. So why am I so nervous!?
target: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_100_044<tab>うう……なんだか緊張するべ……。

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_LORATHIA_110_044<tab>Now that everything's in order, we're ready to begin. Try not to look so tense, dear!
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_LORATHIA_110_044こっちの準備は整ったよ。
まぁ、あまり気負いすぎずに気楽に参加するといいさ。

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SYSTEM_000_044<tab>Your mission, should you choose to accept it, is to engage Lorathia's guests in polite conversation and extol the virtues of Ronitt's master plan. Choose the best responses and generate interest in the Rolling Tankard.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SYSTEM_000_044これから何度か表示される選択肢から適切な言葉を選び、
うまくドワーフ戦車をアピールしましょう！

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SYSTEM_000_045<tab>This coming together of great minds─plus Ronitt─will take several minutes. You may wish to cancel any pending Duty Finder registrations.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SYSTEM_000_045イベントには数分の時間がかかりますので、
コンテンツファインダー申請中の場合などは、ご注意ください。

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SYSTEM_000_046<tab>Are your nerves suitably steeled?
target: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SYSTEM_000_046<tab>お茶会に参加する？

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SYSTEM_000_050<tab>
target: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SYSTEM_000_050<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SYSTEM_000_051<tab>
target: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SYSTEM_000_051<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SYSTEM_000_052<tab>
target: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SYSTEM_000_052<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SYSTEM_000_053<tab>
target: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SYSTEM_000_053<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SYSTEM_000_054<tab>
target: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SYSTEM_000_054<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SYSTEM_000_055<tab>
target: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SYSTEM_000_055<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_IRIOLVA_000_056<tab>What a pleasure it is to make your acquaintance. Lorathia tells us you're in the transportation business, much like Cobleva and I.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_IRIOLVA_000_056はじめまして、わたくしはイリオルヴァ。
コブレヴァの双子の姉で、姉妹で隊商を経営しているの。
堅苦しいのはなしに、ぜひ楽しいお話を聞かせてちょうだいね。

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_COBLEVA_000_057<tab>Yes, we were rather hoping you'd help us with a little problem we've been having of late: hordes of ravenous sin eaters. Terribly irritating, as I'm sure you can imagine.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_COBLEVA_000_057わたくしは妹のコブレヴァ。
心は常に優雅に……そして取引にはときめきを……。
決して裕福ではないけれど、それがわたくしたち姉妹の心がけよ。

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_IRIOLVA_000_058<tab>Is it true that you and yours are presently engaged in the construction of some sort of vehicle capable of warding off such assailants?
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_IRIOLVA_000_058それであなたたち、変わったものを作ってらっしゃるんですって？
ええと……ドワーフ戦車って言ったかしら……？
つまるところ、何ができるものなのかしら？

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SYSTEM_000_059<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SYSTEM_000_059<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SYSTEM_000_060<tab>Ward off? Turn them into mincemeat, more like!
target: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SYSTEM_000_060<tab>なんでも破壊できる最凶の乗り物

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SYSTEM_000_061<tab>It transports goods safely while repelling all manner of threats.
target: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SYSTEM_000_061<tab>はぐれ罪喰いを撃退できる乗り物

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_IRIOLVA_000_062<tab>Oh, I say! That sounds positively ghastly! And I don't think our clients will take too kindly to having their wares covered in bits of mangled sin eater.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_IRIOLVA_000_062あらあら……。
なんでも……破壊ですって……？
思っていたよりも物騒なのね……コブレヴァ。

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_100_063<tab>Well, ah...the cannons are only to be used in emergencies! It's not like the tanks would be sent out lookin' for trouble or nothin'!
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_100_063い、いや……目的は破壊することじゃないんだべ！
主砲はあくまでも罪喰いに対抗するための非常手段なんだ！

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_063<tab>(Oi, might wanna spare them the grisly details, you know?)
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_063オメーも緊張してるのか？
落ち着いて答えれば、きっと大丈夫だべな……！

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_IRIOLVA_000_064<tab>Well, that does sound rather impressive! This could be precisely what we need.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_IRIOLVA_000_064まぁ～っ！
それはそれは、素敵だことっ！
うちの隊商もはぐれ罪喰いには悩まされているものね、コブレヴァ。

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_065<tab>If any sin eaters dare show up, the Rollin' Tankard can deal with 'em before they get anywhere near.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_065へへっ！
罪喰いに向かって遠隔攻撃ができるようにするつもりだから、
戦闘で荷物もぐちゃぐちゃにならないんだべ！

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_100_065<tab>(Heh heh, seems like you've got a way with words. Keep this up and they'll be putty in our hands!)
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_100_065なかなか好感触みたいだ！
この調子だべ！

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_COBLEVA_000_066<tab>It does occur to me, however, that this all seems awfully complicated. Those used to working with amaro may struggle to operate these vehicles of yours.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_COBLEVA_000_066ああ、でもでも……。
わたくしたちのような淑女でも運転できるのかしら……？
アマロのように、乙女の心を汲んでくれるわけじゃないんでしょう？

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SYSTEM_000_067<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SYSTEM_000_067<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SYSTEM_000_068<tab>The controls are manned by a purpose-built automaton.
target: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SYSTEM_000_068<tab>操縦はオートマトンがアシストする！

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SYSTEM_000_069<tab>What could possibly go wrong? Just pull the levers and see what happens!
target: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SYSTEM_000_069<tab>根性で覚えれば大丈夫！

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_COBLEVA_000_070<tab>The wonders of modern technology never cease to amaze me. Machines driving machines... Whatever next!
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_COBLEVA_000_070まぁ～っ、オートマトンちゃんが手伝ってくださるんですって！
なんて素敵なのかしらねぇ、イリオルヴァ！
わたくし、戦車というものにときめいてきちゃったわ！

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_LORATHIA_100_071<tab>That's...a surprisingly good idea.
target: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_LORATHIA_100_071<tab>ふーむ……なるほどね。

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_LORATHIA_000_071<tab>If all it takes is giving instructions to the automaton, anyone could do it. Quite an elegant solution, I must say.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_LORATHIA_000_071指示だけ与えればいいなら、誰でも動かせる。
それで、操縦席にはオートマトンを載せておくってわけかい。
考えたじゃないか。

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_100_071<tab>(You just made that up, didn't you? Ah well, we can work all that out later! For now, carry on doin' what you're doin'!)
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_100_071さすが)) (( )) 02 /var>！
よくわかってくれてるべな！
いい感じだべ！

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_COBLEVA_000_072<tab>It strikes me that trial and error is somewhat ill-advised when dealing with heavy weaponry. I'd hate to blow up something I'm not supposed to!
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_COBLEVA_000_072…………。
イリオルヴァ、どうしましょう。
根性でだなんて、わたくしとても自信がないわ……。

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_073<tab>Oh...um... Hahaha! That was just one of <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>'s little jokes! What <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> really means is that an automaton will take care of everythin'!
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_073おわー、ちょっ……まっ……違うんだべ……！
運転はオートマトンに指示を出すだけなんだべ！
ねーちゃんたちでもラクラク簡単操作なんだ！

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_100_073<tab>(Bloody hells! Even <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> wouldn't say somethin' that bleedin' stupid!)
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_100_073根性は大事だが、戦車の操縦には必要ないんだべ！
なかなか難しいけど頑張るべ……！

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_IRIOLVA_000_074<tab>While this is all very intriguing, young Ronitt, I would feel much more comfortable doing business with you if I could see your face, that I may better read your intentions. Though I do not doubt your sincerity, consider it a matter of courtesy.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_IRIOLVA_000_074ところで、ところで。
ロニットちゃんの兜の下は……どんなお顔なのかしら？
取引をすることになるなら、素顔を見せてくれないとねぇ！

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_075<tab>Y-You want me to take off my h-helmet? B-But...
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_075なっ……え……それは……！
それは…………うぐぐ…………。

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SYSTEM_000_076<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SYSTEM_000_076<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SYSTEM_000_077<tab>Dwarven law prohibits it.
target: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SYSTEM_000_077<tab>ドワーフ族の掟で見せられない

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SYSTEM_000_078<tab>And then what!? You want him to dance on the table for you!?
target: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SYSTEM_000_078<tab>破廉恥な！

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_IRIOLVA_000_079<tab>Oh, I beg your pardon! That was incredibly rude of me.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_IRIOLVA_000_079あらあら、それは大変失礼なことを言ってしまったわね！
そんな掟があるとは知らず……わたくしったら、ごめんなさい。

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_COBLEVA_000_080<tab>We are, much to our embarrassment, unfamiliar with dwarven customs. You were very kind to intervene and prevent any further impertinence on our part.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_COBLEVA_000_080ええ、ええ……とんだ失礼を許してちょうだいね。
けれども、大事なことを正直に伝えてくれて嬉しいわ。

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_081<tab>Thanks, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. If you weren't here, I don't know what I would've done!
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_081)) (( )) 02 /var>…………！
助かったべ……ううっ。

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_100_081<tab>(Bugger my beard! Why'd you have to say that!? Gods, this is awkward...)
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_100_081ううっ……。
ドワーフ族の掟とはいえ、
いたたまれない空気なんだべ……。

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_IRIOLVA_000_082<tab>Well, I think we've covered most of the pertinent points.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_IRIOLVA_000_082さてさて、そろそろ決めましょうか、コブレヴァ。
お茶会とはいえ、取引のきっかけは大事にしなくっちゃ。

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_COBLEVA_000_083<tab>There is, however, one last thing we would like to ask before we reach a decision. What do you think we sisters value most in all the world?
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_COBLEVA_000_083ええ、ええ、そうねイリオルヴァ。
いつもの質問で、見極めちゃいましょう。
この子たちが、信頼に値する取引相手になるかどうか……。

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_IRIOLVACOBLEVA_000_084<tab>(-Iriolva and Cobleva-)Your answer, please!
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_IRIOLVACOBLEVA_000_084(-イリオルヴァとコブレヴァ-)はいっ、わたくしたち姉妹が、
取引に求めていることは何だったでしょう？

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SYSTEM_000_085<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SYSTEM_000_085<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SYSTEM_000_086<tab>Honesty.
target: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SYSTEM_000_086<tab>誠実さ

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SYSTEM_000_087<tab>Excitement.
target: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SYSTEM_000_087<tab>ときめき

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_IRIOLVA_000_088<tab>Oh dear! That's not quite the answer we were looking for.
target: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_IRIOLVA_000_088<tab>ぶっぶー！

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_COBLEVA_000_089<tab>We would like to think that honesty is the bare minimum we can expect from others, especially those with whom we would do business.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_COBLEVA_000_089うーん残念！
誠実さは当たり前よぉ。

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_IRIOLVA_000_090<tab>Luckily, we have been able to ascertain through the course of this conversation that the two of you possess this in abundance.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_IRIOLVA_000_090ふふ……今回は正式な商談ではないけれど、
何気ない会話の内容を聞き洩らさず、相手の好みを把握すること。
それが取引のコツかしら……覚えていてね！

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_IRIOLVA_000_091<tab>The perfect answer!
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_IRIOLVA_000_091エクセレーントッ！！
そう、わたくしたちが取引に求めるものは「ときめき」！

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_COBLEVA_000_092<tab>What would life be like without a little excitement? And what could be more exciting than an ambitious new enterprise, such as the one you are proposing!
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_COBLEVA_000_092パーフェクトッ！！
最初に話したことをしっかり覚えていてくれたのね！
些細な話題にも耳を傾けるその姿勢！

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_IRIOLVA_000_093<tab>It seems that with our business acumen and your...tanks, we have a match made in the heavens!
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_IRIOLVA_000_093あなたたちのこと、とーっても気に入っちゃった！
ドワーフ戦車、応援しちゃおうかしら！
ウフフフ。

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_100_094<tab>Haha! We did it! And they've really taken a shine to you, it seems.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_100_094おっしゃー！
へへっ、ふたりともすっげー上機嫌だべ！
オメーがいてくれて本当に助かったんだべ～！

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SYSTEM_000_094<tab>Iriolva and Cobleva's joyous response bodes well for Ronitt and his Rolling Tankards. You have almost certainly secured buyers for his tanks, provided they reach completion.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SYSTEM_000_094イリオルヴァとコブレヴァ姉妹は、
大満足な様子で、ドワーフ戦車にも興味を持ったようだ！
完成のあかつきには、購入を検討してくれることだろう！

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_100_095<tab>Phew! That was a bit of a struggle, but we got there in the end! Nicely done!
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_100_095ど、どうにか切り抜けたみたいだ！
緊張したけど、オメーがいてくれて心強かったんだべ！

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SYSTEM_000_095<tab>Iriolva and Cobleva's warm response bodes well for Ronitt and his Rolling Tankards. It appears that you have secured buyers for his tanks, provided they reach completion.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SYSTEM_000_095イリオルヴァとコブレヴァ姉妹は、
満足げな様子で、ドワーフ戦車にも興味を持ったようだ！
完成のあかつきには、購入を検討してくれるかもしれない。

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_100_096<tab>Ungh... I'm glad that's over. Maybe you ought to let me do the talkin' next time, eh?
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_100_096うぐぐぐ……ショウダンって難しいんだな……。
勉強になったべ……！

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SYSTEM_000_096<tab>Iriolva and Cobleva were clearly unimpressed by your conversation skills, or lack thereof. In spite of your series of blunders, however, hope is not yet lost. There yet remains the possibility they may purchase Ronitt's tanks after all.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SYSTEM_000_096イリオルヴァとコブレヴァ姉妹は、
やや不機嫌だが、ドワーフ戦車には興味を持ったようだ！
完成のあかつきには、購入を検討してくれるかもしれない。

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_LORATHIA_000_097<tab>Of course, seeing is believing. Once the tanks are finished, you should put on a demonstration. We'd all be interested to see those aetherial cannons in action, but actually getting them up and running will be no easy task, I assure you.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_LORATHIA_000_097ご苦労さん。
ドワーフ戦車が無事に完成したら、
改めてデモンストレーションでもしてやるといいさ。

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_LORATHIA_000_098<tab>Lucky for you, I know just the man to point you in the right direction. I'll write you a letter of introduction requesting he help you in this little endeavor.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_LORATHIA_000_098それじゃ、約束の紹介状を書いてやるから、
ちょっと待ってな！

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_LORATHIA_000_099<tab>It's been a while since we met, and I can't for the life of me remember how they take their tea...
target: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_LORATHIA_000_099<tab>ううむ……今日の紅茶には何が合うかね。

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_LORATHIA_100_100<tab>Give this letter to Rosard in Ballistics. He looks a bit imposing, but he's friendly enough.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_LORATHIA_100_100ほら、クリスタリウムへの紹介状だ。
これをバリスティクス造兵館の「ロサード」って奴に渡しな。
私の名前を出せば悪いようにはしないはずさ。

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_LORATHIA_100_101<tab>Then again, if it's <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> doing the asking, I'm sure he'd be more than happy to help.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_LORATHIA_100_101それに……あんたの頼みだっていうなら、
あそこの奴らは喜んで聞くだろうよ。

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_102<tab>Hmph! One of these days, the people of Norvrandt'll be climbin' over each other for the chance to do <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var> a favor, just you wait and see!
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_102そうなのか……！
やっぱ)) (( )) 02 /var>はすげー奴なんだな！

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_103<tab>But until then, I've got a lot of work ahead of me, so let's get goin'!
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_103よーし、オレ様も負けてられないんだべ！
さっそく一緒に「ロサード」って奴のとこに行くんだべ！

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_LORATHIA_000_104<tab>I've known that Rosard since he was knee-high to a phooka. Wait, do they even have knees?
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_LORATHIA_000_104紹介状をバリスティクス造兵館にいる「ロサード」って奴に渡しな。
私の名前を出せば悪いようにはしないはずさ。

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_COBLEVA_000_105<tab>Lorathia always serves such wonderful tea, and the scenery here is to die for!
target: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_COBLEVA_000_105<tab>また一緒にお茶しましょうね。

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_IRIOLVA_000_106<tab>Is that the distant rumbling of tanks I hear? Or perhaps I'm getting ahead of myself?
target: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_IRIOLVA_000_106<tab>きっとドワーフ戦車でときめかせてね。

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_107<tab>Are we done yet? All this bein' polite's worn me out...
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_107き……緊張したべ……。
ドワーフ戦車の良さ、伝わってるといいべな！

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_ROSARD_000_110<tab>Greetings! What can I do for you this fine <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((evening)) ((morning)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((day)) ((evening)) /var>)) /var>?
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_ROSARD_000_110おう、どうした。
バリスティクス造兵館に何か用かい？

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_111<tab>...and blow their bloody heads off! That's the plan, anyway.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_111というわけで……
罪喰いを遠距離から攻撃できる主砲を搭載したいんだべ！

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_ROSARD_000_112<tab>Ho ho! If it's aether-based firepower you're after, I have just the thing. Right behind me, as it happens!
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_ROSARD_000_112なるほど……紹介状にもそう書いてあるな。
そういうことなら、最適なモンがあるぜ！
後ろにあるもんを見てくれよ！

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_ROSARD_000_113<tab>This model was mass-produced and installed along the perimeter of the Crystarium, specifically to deal with sin eater assaults. Those bastards soon give up the ghost after a blast of concentrated aether to the face! Bwahaha!
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_ROSARD_000_113これは「魔装砲」って言ってなぁ、
罪喰いの侵攻から街を守るために造られたものだ。
クリスタルに蓄積したエーテルをぶっ放す、最高にイカす兵器さ。

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_114<tab>I like the sound of that!
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_114うおおお！！
つまり、エーテルのビームが出るんだべな！？
最高にイカすべな！

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_ROSARD_000_115<tab>I can't take the credit for these crystal cannons, though. Lorathia's the one who originally designed them. I suppose you could call her my mentor.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_ROSARD_000_115だろう？
コイツを設計したのが、ロラシア姐さんなんだが……。
しかし、まさかあの人がこんな頼み事をしてくるなんてなぁ……。

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_ROSARD_000_116<tab>If she says I'm to assist you, who am I to refuse? Now, let me see about getting you copies of our cannon blueprints.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_ROSARD_000_116なんとまぁ……
魔装砲の設計図を、あんたたちに貸してやってほしいとよ！

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_ROSARD_000_117<tab>A pleasant surprise, I take it? Ha, that's the Lorathia I know. Behind that sharp tongue and piercing gaze, she's one of the most caring people you'll ever meet. I expect she appreciates what you're doing, especially considering what happened at Holminster.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_ROSARD_000_117態度には出さないかもしれんが、あんたに恩義を感じてるんだろう。
姐さんの故郷は、あの「ホルミンスター」だ。
気丈な人だが、失ったものは余りにも大きいからな……。

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_ROSARD_000_118<tab>Not to mention that we in the Crystarium owe much and more to you for restoring the night sky. It's not every day we get the chance to aid the Warrior of Darkness <var 08 E905 ((herself)) ((himself)) /var>!
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_ROSARD_000_118言わずもがな、クリスタリウムの俺らも、
あんたには感謝してもしきれないよ……。
なんて言ったって、夜を取り戻してくれた「闇の戦士」様だからな！

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_ROSARD_000_119<tab>And it goes without saying we here in the Crystarium are extremely grateful for everything you're doing. You're an inspiration to us all!
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_ROSARD_000_119言わずもがな、クリスタリウムの俺らも、
あんたには感謝してもしきれないよ……。
いつだって、あんたは前線で戦って、俺らに勇気をくれるからな。

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_ROSARD_000_120<tab>At any rate, every sin eater your tanks put down is one less for our soldiers to deal with, so sharing the plans for the crystal cannons is the least we can do.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_ROSARD_000_120だから、この世界を守ろうと頑張ってくれているあんたたちに、
この、魔装砲の設計図を託そうじゃねぇか！

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_ROSARD_000_121<tab>In the meantime, I'll look forward to hearing of your success.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_ROSARD_000_121ほらよ、ドワーフの坊主！
ノルヴラントの平和のために、素晴らしいものを作ってくれよ！

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_122<tab>It won't be long before tales of the Rollin' Tankards are on the lips of everyone in Norvrandt. Many thanks, Rosard!
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_122おっちゃん、ありがとよ！
絶対にこの技術を活かして、困ってる奴らを助けてみせるからよ！
信じて待っててくれよな！

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_123<tab>Come on, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. We've got cannons to build! To the Anvil!
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_123そんじゃ、さっそく「ワッツハンマー・ガレージ」に戻って、
仕組みを応用できるように主砲の設計をしてみるべ！

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_100_123<tab>Crystal cannon? Check. Big man? Check. This must be the place.
target: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_100_123<tab>つ、強そうな人なんだべ……！

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_ROSARD_000_124<tab>When Lorathia was here, she'd spend about half her time working and the other half drinking tea. She still got more done than the rest of us put together, though.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_ROSARD_000_124もしかして、あんたも「お茶会」に参加したのかい……？
……ご苦労様だぜ。

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_LORATHIA_000_125<tab>Rosard give you what you need, did he? Better get to work, then!
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_LORATHIA_000_125うまくいったかい？
しっかりやるんだよ。

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_130<tab>I swear, everywhere we go, people treat you like you're some sort of hero! I suppose bein' a hero's most trusted friend is the next best thing, so I'll settle for that.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_130オメーは色んな人から尊敬されてるんだな！
なんだか、ダチのオレ様まで誇らしい気分なんだべ！

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_131<tab>Havin' said that, when it comes to buildin' these tanks, you're still my assistant! Ha! And it just so happens I've got some work for you.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_131借りた設計図のおかげで、
主砲の問題は一挙に解決できそうだ。

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_132<tab>There's more to these cannons than just crystal, as you can probably guess. In fact, there are so many different parts, it makes my head spin just thinkin' about it!
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_132ただし、主砲はこれまで以上に、部品の精密さが要求される。
つーことで、オメーの手を貸してほしいんだべ！

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_133<tab>I reckon there are a few things you can put together for me, though. Shouldn't be too hard for someone as skilled as you.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_133オメーには、「」を作ってほしい！
エーテル伝導率を極限まで高めるための金属だべ。
伝導率が高いほど、主砲の威力も高まるべな！

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_134<tab>I reckon there are a few things you can put together for me, though. Shouldn't be too hard for someone as skilled as you.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_134オメーには、「」を作ってほしい！
エーテルの伝導を遮断する緩衝材だ！
それがねーと、搭乗員までシビれちまうべな！

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_135<tab>I reckon there are a few things you can concoct for me, though. Shouldn't be too hard for someone as skilled as you.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_135オメーには、「」を作ってほしい！
エーテル伝導率を極限まで高めるための触媒だべ。
伝導率が高いほど、主砲の威力も高まるべな！

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_136<tab>As usual, you'll find everythin' you need in the Fetchomatic Mechatoad. And if not...well, you're a clever <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((bloke)) /var>. You'll come up with somethin'.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_136素材の心配ならいらねーべ。
「資材調達オートマトン」から、必要な分を取り出して使ってくれ！

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_137<tab>Don't worry about botchin' it. There are plenty more materials where those came from.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_137ん？　素材が足りなくなったのか？
「資材調達オートマトン」から、必要な分を取り出して使ってくれ！

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_138<tab>Don't worry about botchin' it. There are plenty more materials where those came from.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_138ん？　素材が足りなくなったのか？
「資材調達オートマトン」から、必要な分を取り出して使ってくれ！

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_139<tab>Don't worry about botchin' it. There are plenty more materials where those came from.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_139ん？　素材が足りなくなったのか？
「資材調達オートマトン」から、必要な分を取り出して使ってくれ！

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_AUTOMATON_000_140<tab><boop> <bleep>
target: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_AUTOMATON_000_140<tab>ガガ……。

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_AUTOMATON_000_141<tab><boop> <bleep>
target: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_AUTOMATON_000_141<tab>ガガ……。

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_AUTOMATON_000_142<tab><boop> <bleep>
target: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_AUTOMATON_000_142<tab>ガガ……。

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_AUTOMATON_000_143<tab><beep> Request for materials acknowledged.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_AUTOMATON_000_143ガガ……素材イル？
ヘイヨー。

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_AUTOMATON_000_144<tab><beep> Request for materials acknowledged.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_AUTOMATON_000_144ガガ……素材イル？
ヘイヨー。

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_AUTOMATON_000_145<tab><beep> Request for ingredients acknowledged.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_AUTOMATON_000_145ガガ……素材イル？
ヘイヨー。

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_146<tab>Well? Don't keep me in suspense!
target: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_146<tab>頼んでたものは作ってくれたべか？

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_147<tab>Heh! Looks like all that time spent around a master engineer like me is payin' off.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_147さすが)) (( )) 02 /var>だべ！
こんなに魂の入った素材を見たの、生まれて初めてだ……！
オメーの技術には、度肝を抜かれるべ！

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_148<tab>Once I've built and fine-tuned the cannon, the prototype tank'll be ready!
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_148さあ、これで素材を組み上げれば、
いよいよドワーフ戦車の試作車両が完成するんだべ！
上手くいくかドキドキするべな……！

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_149<tab>After that, it's just a matter of producin' more of the same as quickly and cheaply as possible. Not that I'll be cuttin' any corners, mind!
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_RONITT_000_149しばらくはメンテナンスや効率化に協力してもらうと思うが、
そのときはよろしく頼むべ！

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SYSTEM_000_100<tab>With the final piece of the puzzle, the crystal cannon, in place, the Rolling Tankard prototype is all but complete.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SYSTEM_000_100「魔装砲」の技術を取り入れた主砲を搭載し、
ついにドワーフ戦車の試作車両が完成した！

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SYSTEM_000_101<tab>However, this marks only the beginning of Ronitt's plans, as it will take more than a single tank to ensure the safe transportation of goods to and from various locations across Norvrandt.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SYSTEM_000_101ロニットは引き続き、実用性や快適性を追求するべく、
戦車の改良を重ねるつもりのようだ！

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SYSTEM_000_200<tab>You have achieved <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Respected<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> reputation with Watts's Anvil.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SYSTEM_000_200「ドワーフ族：ワッツハンマー・ガレージ」との友好関係が、
「敬意」になりました。
主砲の製作に力を貸したことで、信頼を勝ち得たようです。

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SYSTEM_000_201<tab>New dwarf beast tribe daily quests are now available from Regitt at Watts's Anvil.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SYSTEM_000_201これ以降、ワッツハンマー・ガレージにいる「レギット」より、
新たな「蛮族デイリークエスト」を受注することができます。

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SYSTEM_000_202<tab>Furthermore, you will be able to undertake three additional quests from Regitt as a reputation bonus. This bonus is available until the daily reset time for beast tribe quests.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SYSTEM_000_202なお、友好ランクが上がった当日に限り、
「レギット」から受注できるデイリークエストの数が、
ボーナスとして、3つ追加されています。

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SYSTEM_000_203<tab>These additional quests will become available after accepting all current daily quests from Regitt. Please be advised that you cannot undertake these quests if you have no remaining allowances.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SYSTEM_000_203友好ランクが上がる前に発行されたデイリークエストを、
すべて受注するとボーナス分が発行され、
受注権のある限り、これを受注することができます。

source: TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SYSTEM_000_204<tab>You now have access to a wider selection of wares from Mizutt.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA003_03898_SYSTEM_000_204また、「ミズット」より、
「友好関係：敬意」の商品を購入できるようになりました。
今後の冒険に役立てましょう！
